subcontent: The North Country’s Premiere Apartment Community

content: WELCOME TO THE ERIN APARTMENT COMPLEX

Erin Heights and Erin Court are the region’s premiere, luxury apartments located in Plattsburgh, New York.  With 68 total units, the Erin properties serve a high-end residential tenancy base. While ideally located near the area’s commercial district, community hospital and educational and religious institutions, the Erin apartments maintain a sense of seclusion and privacy with the properties’ unique design and location – a valued feature by the community’s tenants.
To learn more about Erin Height and Erin Court, visit this website more fully or email Info@ErinApartments.com..
